name: screenbeard
message: If I recall correctly, I did have this working once at another school but I think I used registry settings to do it. In the registry of my mandatory user profile I set HKCUSoftwareMicrosoftWindowsCurrentVersionExplorerShell FoldersDesktop and HKCUSoftwareMicrosoftWindowsCurrentVersionExplorerUser Shell Folders to H:Desktop. My memory is very vague though (hence these posts written somewhere I'll never lose them) so that might not be all it took to get it working on XP.
